moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Scurry Ahead!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense. Drastically raises the user’s Speed.

passives.name: Speeding Sun 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Swag Bag 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of raising stat values with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: On a Roll 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
